version_description:
• You can now enroll for our Bill Payment service, as well as add or delete billers
• Payment Activity now displays pending, processed, and failed payments
• Added "Have a Question?" feature so you can find answers to frequently asked questions
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• A Personal Assurance Message (PAM) no longer displays when you sign on to your account
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes


We continually listen to your feedback to help us search for ways to improve our mobile app. Within the next few months, look for the following new feature:
• Simpler ways to access your account, including introducing Touch ID and Mobile PINs to Mobile Banking

• You can now use Touch ID® or a Mobile PIN to access your account faster
• Your User ID and Password are located on one screen for easier sign on
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes
• Minor enhancements and bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes for iOS 10

• Transfer money easily from your account to another Golden 1 member using member-to-member transfers
• Enjoy credit card information with available credit and pending authorizations displaying in real time
• New debit card alerts allow you to create and manage alerts so you always know when and where your card is used
• Easily search the last 90 days' worth of transactions using a description, amount, or date
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• Fixes error when using third-party keyboard add-ons
• Transfer money easily from your account to another Golden 1 member using member-to-member transfers
• Enjoy credit card information with available credit and pending authorizations displaying in real time
• New debit card alerts allow you to create and manage alerts so you always know when and where your card is used
• Easily search the last 90 days' worth of transactions using a description, amount, or date
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• View credit card activity from past statement periods
• Update your account preferences, such as account nicknames
• Receive new message notifications at the same email address as your security alerts
• Minor enhancements and bug fixes
• Minor enhancements and bug fixes

• Improved mobile deposit interface for easier and faster deposits
• New Pay button to simplify making credit card payments
• Enhanced Touch ID® functionality
• Minor enhancements and bug fixes
• Minor enhancements and bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes related to iOS 11

• Withdrawal transaction alerts now include point-of-sale transactions
• Quicker processing of scheduled credit card payments as transfers
• Performance improvements when logging in
• Alert history to always display Pacific time zone
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• Revamped mobile experience optimized for iOS devices
• Support for out-of-band authentication
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes
• Minor enhancements and bug fixes

• Fixes error when using third-party keyboard add-ons
• Transfer money easily from your account to another Golden 1 member using member-to-member transfers
• Enjoy credit card information with available credit and pending authorizations displaying in real time
• New debit card alerts allow you to create and manage alerts so you always know when and where your card is used
• Easily search the last 90 days' worth of transactions using a description, amount, or date
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• The 'Account Activity' screens display more account details
• The 'More' menu includes link to our Card Controls app and displays routing number
• One-time passcodes requested less often for normal usage
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• View Electronic Statements from your iPhone
• Use international phone numbers to receive one-time security codes when logging in to your account
• Provide feedback about our mobile app through the new rating prompt
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• Take control of your credit by tracking your credit score, monitoring your credit report, and discovering loan options using our new 'My Credit Score' feature
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• Increased mobile deposit limits for eligible members
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• Enhanced the experience when viewing electronic statements & documents
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• Use the 'Manage your debit cards' feature to sign on easily and securely into our new Debit Card Controls app
• Mobile deposit experience has been enhanced
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes
• Bug fixes related to iOS 14

• Easily log into our Card Controls app using the 'Manage your cards' feature which now supports both debit and credit cards
• View credit card account details, such as transaction history and e-statements, in a more unified experience
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

• Increased mobile deposit limits for eligible members
• Enhanced system stability and security
• Other minor enhancements and bug fixes
• Minor enhancements and bug fixes
